format_training_data module

format_training_data.format_and_save_certain(hfile, output)[source]

Wrapper function to read, format, and save certain training datasets.

Parameters:
hfilestr

Filepath to hdf file produced by gwdistributions containing certain injections

outputstr

Filepath at which to save reformatted and annotated data

format_training_data.format_and_save_hopeless(hfile, output, hkey='events')[source]

Wrapper function to read, format, and save hopeless training datasets.

Parameters:
hfilestr

Filepath to hdf file produced by gwdistributions containing hopeless injections

outputstr

Filepath at which to save reformatted and annotated data

format_training_data.format_real_injection_data(file, output)[source]

Script to load and prepare LVK O3b CBC injections for use in neural network training. Specifically, this function adds some derived quantities and imposes a selection cut to label each injection as “found” or “missed”

Parameters:
filestr

Filepath to hdf file containing injection data

outputstr

Filepath at which to save pandas.DataFrame with processed injection information, to be used in neural network training.

format_training_data.mark_detections_certain(hfile, injectionData)[source]

Simple helper script to annotate certain detections as found/missed

Parameters:
hfilestr

Filepath to hdf file produced by gwdistributions containing certain injections.

injectionDatapandas.DataFrame

Data frame object returned by read_and_annotate(). Annotated in-place.

format_training_data.mark_detections_hopeless(injectionData)[source]

Simple helper script to mark all injections in a given dataset as missed.

Parameters:
injectionDatapandas.DataFrame

Data frame object returned by read_and_annotate(). Annotated in-place with detections marked as missed.

format_training_data.read_and_annotate(hfile, hkey='events')[source]

Helper function to load hdf file prepared by the gwdistributions and add necessary derived data.

Parameters:
hfileh5py.File

Opened h5py.File containing injection data

hkeystr

Name of relevant dataset inside hdf object. Default events

Returns:
injectionDatapandas.DataFrame

Data frame containing injection data and additional derived parameters
